Package pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers

This package contains the event handler classes for the GUI.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AdminGUI_AdminViewEventHandler This class handles events dispatched from the gui-components in AdminView
AdminGUI_SystemEventHandler The AdminGUI System event handler handles all events coming from the system, and are directed at the admin GUI.
ComponentEventHandler An class that manages the event dispatcher and provides a lookup table for Components and what events they produce
CookGUI_CookViewEventHandler Handles all events generated by user interaction with the Cook GUI view.
CookGUI_SystemEventHandler Handles all events from the system directed at the cook GUI
DeliveryGUI_DeliveryViewEventHandler Handles all events generated by user interaction with the delivery GUI
DeliveryGUI_SystemEventHandler Handles all events coming from the system and that are directed at the delivery GUI
MenuBarEventHandler Handles events related to the main window's menu bar
OrderGUI_OrderViewEventHandler Handles all events generated by user interaction with the order GUI
OrderGUI_SystemEventHandler Handles all the events coming from the system directed at the Order GUI.
OrderGUI_TemporaryOrderDataStorage A class that temporarily holds order data while the user is creating a new order in the Order GUI
 

Package pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers Description

This package contains the event handler classes for the GUI.

All the views has its own class that sends read/write events to the database and receives events from the other GUI components. In addition every view has another class that handles events that is passed to the views, such as events that notifies the view that updated data is available from the database.
